Passives.Title: Embodiment of Light
Passives.Description: For every holy element unit in range, this unit gains an additional 20% attack. Additionally, this unit deals 2x damage to dark element enemies.

Passives.Title: Hollow Resonance
Passives.Description: For every unique time based status effect affecting an enemy on the map, this unit gains a stack of \'Hollow Resonance\' (max 3 stacks). When this unit reaches the maximum amount of stacks, he nukes all enemies on the map for 4 times his attack and applying paralysis with his attack stat (140 second global cooldown).

Passives.Title: Spiritual Union
Passives.Description: Any time an enemy in this unit's range has paralysis applied to them, they gain tremor as well as tether, unless both of these status effects are already applied, in which case paralysis will apply as normal (if possible) and apply a stack of shock.   <sc>Shock:</sc> This status effect applies a stack on hit, and deals 5% damage (of the first stacks tower) per stack every 5 seconds. This status effect lasts for 5 seconds. Additionally it goes from 5% to 10% if paralysis is applied.

Passives.Title: The One Who Saw The Future
Passives.Description: Once every 20 seconds this unit buffs all allies in range by 20% range and -10% spa for 20 seconds. This can be extended by 10 seconds per kill. (Up to 20 seconds)

Passives.Title: Bloodlust
Passives.Description: All enemies in this unit's range can have infinite stacks of bloodloss, every 5 attacks this unit will deal 100% of his damage multiplied by a fourth of the bloodloss stacks to each enemy in range and apply poison to each enemy in range for 25 seconds. After this, all enemies in range will have their bloodloss stacks cut in half.

Passives.Title: Dominator's Touch
Passives.Description: Applies knockback to all enemies in range every 10 seconds. 10s global cooldown.

Passives.Title: Marshal
Passives.Description: For every evolved Aura King unit or shadow unit in this unit's range, gain +3% damage per wave (capping out at 50% extra damage).

Passives.Title: Level Up
Passives.Description: Every 20 kills, this unit will recieve a random buff between +2% damage, +2.5% range, or -1% SPA. These buffs cap out at 35%, 50%, and -15% respectively.

Passives.Title: Monarch's Domain
Passives.Description: All summons spawned on the map gain +70% health.

Passives.Title: Necromancy
Passives.Description: Anytime this unit kills an enemy, there is a 33% chance he summons them from base for 125% of his attack stat as health. Additionally, every upgrade summons a new shadow to fight next to him.

Passives.Title: Base
Passives.Description: Cannot attack, 5% chance to go berserk when enemies spawn (QTE will appear). Fail QTE: Transforms into LSSJ. After 4 waves: Transforms into SSJ automatically.

Passives.Title: SSJ
Passives.Description: Gains +3% DMG every 1 Attack. After 500 seconds goes into his LSSJ form.

Passives.Title: LSSJ
Passives.Description: Immune to all negative status effects. Every 60 seconds this unit does a special attack (Overflowing Power). Retains the attack boost from his previous form.

Passives.Title: The Zoo
Passives.Description: Spawn Deer summons every attack.

Passives.Title: Explosive Antlers
Passives.Description: On death, Deer detonate and apply 3 stacks of Burn to enemies within 5 studs.

Passives.Title: Toxikensis
Passives.Description: Enemies in range can have Poison stack up to 50 times. Anytime this unit attacks an enemy with 50 stacks of Poison they will instead apply a stack of Bloodloss. For every stack of Poison an enemy in range has Akame gains 5% extra damage.

Passives.Title: Father of Demons
Passives.Description: On placement convert 1 tower in range into a demon, convert an additional tower in range into a demon on every upgrade. (Up to 6) When a tower is converted into a demon randomly applies an applicable Demon Art (Passive) to that tower. Once a Demon Art is applied, it is no longer applicable. If this tower is deleted or sold, deletes ALL converted demon towers in range. Converted Demon Towers cannot be sold. (Except Pot Demon)

Passives.Title: Golden Wind
Passives.Description: Enemies in Dreamer's range that have the Overgrowth status effect take 10% of this unit's damage every second.

Passives.Title: Life Manipulation
Passives.Description: Upon killing an enemy with the Overgrowth status effect, summon a Ladybug. Ladybugs have 1 hp, but upon contact with an enemy, deal 5% of their current health onto themselves as damage.

Passives.Title: Conscious Acceleration
Passives.Description: Enemies that are attacked by this unit are sped up for 2 seconds and then stunned for 6 seconds. 10s global cooldown.

Passives.Title: Spiritual Pressure
Passives.Description: The closer the enemy gets to Eyezen the more they are slowed by up to 30% and buffs all allies in range by 20% damage.

Passives.Title: Teacher of Magic
Passives.Description: When Friend attacks an enemy in range with a Status Effect applied, that Status Effect is amplified by 20% for that tick.

Passives.Title: Everything I've Got
Passives.Description: Every 10 attacks gain +600% damage for 1 attack, then remove this buff and lose 1 upgrade.

Passives.Title: Heavenly Embodiment
Passives.Description: For every holy element unit in range, this unit gains an additional 35% attack.

Passives.Title: Reality Overwrite
Passives.Description: This unit gives every holy element unit in range a passive that deals 1 stack of Tremor on attack until they are sold or deleted.

Passives.Title: Locking In
Passives.Description: This unit starts with -50% damage. If any Gen Z unit is sold or destroyed, gain +20% damage and remove the -50% damage nerf. This passive's stat amount is increased by +20% more damage for every upgrade the Gen Z had gained before being sold/deleted. Can only apply once

Passives.Title: Arrival of the King
Passives.Description: On placement deletes all towers in range, gaining 20% of each deleted towers damage and gaining all their status effects.

Passives.Title: Dice Roll
Passives.Description: Every attack rolls random Damage/SPA/Range within the current upgrade thresholds. Damage is scaled by +50% per upgrade (up to +150% at max).

Passives.Title: Enlightment
Passives.Description: Every attack this unit gains +5% damage. Cap of 400% If this unit is sold deal 1000% damage to all enemies in range and inflict enemies with poison. This nuke can only occur once per match.

Passives.Title: Holding Back
Passives.Description: Next upgrade can be bought for however much yen you currently have (does not apply to final upgrade), the amount of % difference in amount paid vs the actual cost detracts from the amount of attack gained.

Passives.Title: The Psychic
Passives.Description: Every enemy attacked by this unit is marked with a thought bubble and will receive 20% more damage when attacked. Any unit within this Unit's range gains increased AOE.

Passives.Title: Geass
Passives.Description: This unit applies a random status effect every hit between: Tremor, Bloodloss, and Paralysis.

Passives.Title: Overcharge
Passives.Description: This unit buffs all allies in range by 45% for 10 seconds, then debuffs them by 10% range and 5% SPA for 5 seconds. This passive has a 10 second global cooldown before running again.

Passives.Title: Ambush
Passives.Description: Whenever any enemy in range is stunned, he automatically attacks that enemy. (No animation, single target)

Passives.Title: Fireworks
Passives.Description: Burn DoTs in this units radius can now stack. When this unit attacks a burning enemy, detonates all burn damage on that enemy and does the full damage of those burn dots in an AoE of 15 range from the detonation.

Passives.Title: D4C
Passives.Description: Anytime this unit is upgraded, he gains 1 place limit; Anytime the root (first placed) unit of this unit attacks, all other place limits of this unit attack in tandem regardless of their SPA.

Passives.Title: Level Up
Passives.Description: This unit will Auto Upgrade itself after reaching a certain amount of kills.

Passives.Title: Frostbite Eruption
Passives.Description: Frostbite eruption within this unit's range use this unit's attack stat instead of allies' attack stats, Extends the detonation time for Frostbite stacks from 6 seconds to 48 seconds.

Passives.Title: Level Up
Passives.Description: Every 20 kills, this unit will recieve a random buff between +1% damage, +2% range, or -0.5% SPA. These buffs cap out at 30%, 40%, and -10% respectively.

Passives.Title: Necromancy
Passives.Description: Anytime this unit kills an enemy, there is a 50% chance he summons them from base for 150% of his attack stat as health. Additionally, every 2 upgrades summons a new shadow to fight next to him.

Passives.Title: Instinct
Passives.Description: Upon activating bloodloss gain +50% damage and -30% SPA buffs during 15 seconds.

Passives.Title: Alien Leader
Passives.Description: Every psychic element unit in this unit's range will gain a 25% damage buff (units can only be affected by this passive once).

Passives.Title: Battle Mania
Passives.Description: This unit applies a random status effect to every Enemy hit.

Passives.Title: Set Your Heart Ablaze
Passives.Description: Every fire element unit in this unit's range will gain a 25% damage buff (units can only be affected by this passive once).

Passives.Title: Ghost Clones
Passives.Description: Every 30 seconds Gobanks will summon ghost of himself doing damages to every enemies it encounter.

Passives.Title: Fusion Duration
Passives.Description: On placement this unit has a 120s Fusion Duration timer that continuously counts down. His dmg is buffed by +(seconds left)%. At 0 seconds this unit gains a permament 15% range buff.

Passives.Title: Power of Friendship
Passives.Description: For every fighting element unit in this unit's range, this unit gains an additional 5% attack buff.

Passives.Title: Dark Cloud Blade
Passives.Description: If the enemy has more than 10 Bloodloss stacks, double this unit's Bloodloss stacks per hit.

Passives.Title: Rage
Passives.Description: This unit gains 5% attack per wave (max +65% damage buff).

Passives.Title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
Passives.Description: Every fighting element unit in this unit's range will gain a 25% damage buff (units can only be affected by this passive once).

Passives.Title: Wood Release
Passives.Description: When attacking enemies afflicted with Overgrowth remove the status effect and deal +400% damage.

Passives.Title: Darkness Within
Passives.Description: Every dark element unit in this unit's range will gain a 25% damage buff (units can only be affected by this passive once).

Passives.Title: Godspeed
Passives.Description: Every electric element unit in this unit's range will gain a 25% damage buff (units can only be affected by this passive once).

Passives.Title: Blade Dancer
Passives.Description: Upon activating bloodloss, this unit deals +200% extra damage. Additionally gets -5% SPA per bloodloss activated. (Max -15% SPA)

Passives.Title: Blinding Light
Passives.Description: Every holy element unit in this unit's range will gain a 25% damage buff (units can only be affected by this passive once).

Passives.Title: This is This, and That is That.
Passives.Description: This unit applies a random status effect to every Enemy hit.

Passives.Title: Concert
Passives.Description: This unit buffs all allied units in range by (# of towers in range  0.3  (Upgrade Level + 1)% extra damage.

Passives.Title: Healing Grimoire
Passives.Description: This unit heals the base based on her healing stat every time her SPA loops by. Additionally, automatically upgrade this unit once every time a wave passes.

Passives.Title: Quick Metabolism
Passives.Description: his unit will get +10 % damage every attack (cap of 100% damage). If this unit stops attacking for 15 seconds, the damage boost will be lost.

Passives.Title: Quick Metabolism
Passives.Description: his unit will get +10 % damage every attack (cap of 100% damage). If this unit stops attacking for 15 seconds, the damage boost will be lost.

Passives.Title: Chimera Summon
Passives.Description: Every 30 seconds Neko will summon a chimera doing damage to every enemy it encounters. Neko will also heal any summon in range.

Passives.Title: Blood Legacy
Passives.Description: When no enemies are within 10% of this unit's range, apply 1 stack of bloodloss to every enemy in range every 2 seconds. If there are enemies within 10% of her range, apply 2 stacks of bloodloss to every enemy in range every 2 second.

Passives.Title: The Hand
Passives.Description: When this unit attacks an enemy with less than 15% of their max health left, it has a 50% chance to instantly kill the enemy. This does not include bosses.

Passives.Title: Bread Muncher
Passives.Description: This unit makes yen based on their yen stat every wave.

Passives.Title: Silver Chariot
Passives.Description: When attacking the same target for the second time, deal 70% extra damage this attack.

Passives.Title: Stand Mastery
Passives.Description: Every wave reduces SPA by 3% (30% cap)

Passives.Title: Bushogoma
Passives.Description: Every 10 seconds this unit deals 3 stacks of bloodloss in his range.

Passives.Title: Ghost clones
Passives.Description: Every 25 seconds Boogtenks will summon ghost of himself doing damages to every enemies it encounter.

Passives.Title: Nullify
Passives.Description: Every 40 seconds, stop the enemies in range from using any built in passives (regeneration, exploding, etc.) for 20 seconds.

Passives.Title: Today's Forecast
Passives.Description: Every 5 seconds apply a tick of Today's Forecast to all enemies in range. Additionally switch to a random forecast every 3 ticks. 15 sec  Forecasts list: <sc>Thunderstorm:</sc> Inflicts Paralysis to enemies in range. <sc>Frog Rain:</sc> Inflicts Tether to enemies in range. <sc>Blizzard:</sc> Inflicts Frostbite to enemies in range.

Passives.Title: Sylph's Push
Passives.Description: Every attack, apply a small knockback on every Enemy hit. 10s global cooldown.

Passives.Title: Raging Wind
Passives.Description: When knocked back, enemies within this unit's range take 25% of the knockbacker's damage.

Passives.Title: Sylph's Push
Passives.Description: Every attack, apply a small knockback on every Enemy hit. 10s global cooldown.

Passives.Title: Shunko
Passives.Description: Anytime this unit hits an enemy with Paralysis and Burn applied, this unit will gain one stack of Charging and instantly proc the damage from the Paralysis and Burn, Upon reaching 10 stacks of Charging this unit will deal 1000% of her attack stat as damage to all units in range. Afterwhich, the Charging count will reset to 0 and Yoruichi will gain a permament -5% SPA buff (capping out at -30%).

Passives.Title: Thunderous Clarity
Passives.Description: When an enemy goes out of this unit's range, he instantly targets that enemy and does a single instantaneous attack that does 15x his damage. The force of this attack creates a shockwave that stuns and slows all enemies in his range for 15 seconds (60s global cooldown).

Passives.Title: B Rank Healer
Passives.Description: This unit heals the base based on her healing stat every time her SPA loops by. Additionally, automatically upgrade this unit once every time a wave passes.

Passives.Title: World's Best Detective
Passives.Description: This unit makes yen based on their yen stat every wave.

Passives.Title: Cat Burglar
Passives.Description: This unit makes yen based on their yen stat every wave.
